text: Angels Fall First is the debutalbum by the Finnish symphonic metal group Nightwish. == Track listing == # "Elvenpath" – 4:40 # "Beauty and the Beast" – 6:24 # "The Carpenter" – 5:57 # "Astral Romance" – 5:12 # "Angels Fall First" – 5:34 # "Tutankhamen" – 5:31 # "Nymphomaniac Fantasia" – 4:47 # "Know Why The Nightingale Sings" – 4:14 # "Lappi (Lapland)" – 9:20 == Personnel == * Tarja Turunen – lead vocals * Tuomas Holopainen – keyboards, piano, vocals (on track 2, 3, 4, 11), lyrics, producer, arrangements * Emppu Vuorinen – guitars, bass guitar * Jukka Nevalainen – drums, percussion * Esa Lehtinen – flute * Tero Kinnunen – engineering, mixing, recording * Mika Jussila – mastering * Garry Black – cover photo * Toni Härkönen – photography Category:1997 albums
title: Angels Fall First
